channel.title: Easy2boot on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Easy2boot on Machine Learning

item.title: Easy2boot How To
item.description: Rufus # Open-source Microsoft application (thus can download official MS ISOs). Rufus Features It is a 100% free utility software for Windows users. Rufus has a DOS-compatible environment to run legacy tools with FreeDOS and MBR partitions. Allows formatting the USB disk into multiple file formats including UDF, NTFS, ReFS, or FAT. Easily compute the MD5, SHA-256, and SHA-1 image hashes. Elevated UAC and UI structure. The program can be downloaded on both desktops and laptops.
